title: Music Commands
description: When I'm not saving the world, I'm DJing in all the biggest Discord Servers. Got a song request? I'll show you how to play it.

fields.name: +music join
fields.value: if you use this command while you're in a voice channel, I'll jump in too

fields.name: +music leave
fields.value: makes me leave the voice channel I'm currently in

fields.name: +music add <youtube-link>
fields.value: use this command and provide a YouTube link and I'll add that video to my music queue

fields.name: +music remove <value>
value: remove a song from the list, use `+music list` to see where it is in the queue
if you remove the currently playing song, it will keep playing

fields.name: +music list
fields.value: list all the music that is currently in the queue - also marks which song is currently on the deck

fields.name: +music play
fields.value: when I'm in a voice channel I'll start playing the song currently on the dock

fields.name: +music pause
fields.value: pauses any music that is currently playing

fields.name: +music volume <value>
fields.value: sets the volume of the music, this can be between 0 and 10

fields.name: +music skip <value>
fields.value: skip to a specific song in the queue

fields.name: +music skip
fields.value: skip to the next song in the queue

fields.name: +music loop
fields.value: flicks the loop switch, when it's on your current song will repeat, when it's off I'll go through your queue

fields.name: +music reset
fields.value: having trouble with the music? This will reset all my music settings!
